product_name: The North Face Grizzly Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Grizzly Jacket for women pairs Polartec(R) Grizzly high-loft fleece with Power Stretch(R) panels to create an amazing warmth-to-weight ratio for backcountry adventures. Inspired by bear fur, silky Polartec(R) Thermo Pro(R) Grizzly fleece combines textures and pile lengths to trap warmth close to the body. Grizzly fleece offers optimum temperature regulation and ideal packability. Power Stretch panels breathe and let you reach and stretch easily. The North Face Grizzly Jacket for women features an overlay zippered chest pocket and 2 zippered hand pockets, plus a hem cinch cord. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Grizzly Jacket for women pairs Polartec(R) Grizzly high-loft fleece with Power Stretch(R) panels to create an amazing warmth-to-weight ratio for backcountry adventures.
